website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot Disco FPV is a lot of fun to fly, but isn't the most practical drone on the market.
cons: Requires large, open space for landing

customer_reviews.title: Autopilot glitches
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine but had some problems with the autopilot, it stop working randomly and caused two crashes. Also the servos are cheaply made and one of them stripped causing a third crash.
customer_reviews.author: madhavadas

customer_reviews.title: Missing battery, opened box, dirty drone..
customer_reviews.text: Parrot Disco was advertised as new and arrived looking like it had been opened before. The drone and all the components were covered in layers of dust inside the box and the drones battery was missing. But one positive thing is that it did arrive a day early.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty cool at first then it started having problems like I would lose control of it and it would stay throttled up and couldn't throttle it down to land it and for these reasons I crashed it a couple times now I wish I wouldn't have gotten it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: To say I am disappointed is to understate
customer_reviews.text: Parrot claims maximum range is 2000 meters or 1.24 miles. With clear air line of sight, maximum distance in real life was 500 to 1000 feet, even with the controller pointed directly at the aircraft. On the second flight, the Disco reported "Drone Disconnected" or "Max Range Exceeded" at 1000 feet distance max in clear air line of sight. Upon receiving "Drone Disconnected", and with 85% battery remaining, the Disco circled a few times and then crashed. To say I am disappointed is to understate. We awaited this delivery anxiously; perhaps the lesson here is "never buy anything at Version 1.0."
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I so love this it have e everything you'll need
customer_reviews.author: nigel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have already got it last week, no problem on it and it's very interesting, thank you
customer_reviews.author: I Chieh, Chung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great drone, just wish they still made them. Or a bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Photon-X, I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fixed wing drone, easy to fly. simple instructions. give wonderful fpv flight experience.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Botes

customer_reviews.title: OMG !!!!!! WHAT A BLAST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Have to fly to believe. I've flown quads for a while and I've flown four (now five) RC planes and except for the Disco, none of the flights lasted longer then a minute before destruction. It has so many safety systems, not even I could kill it??? :^) Between landings and celebratory dances, I was flying for a solid hour!! ... on one battery! I couldn't get it to connect for FPV or telemetry, I just flew line-of-sight.... pilot error, I'm sure. WHAT A BLAST ! ! ! ! ! . ... and it's FAST! LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N77E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great drone! a little tough to not break the wings though. the replacements are really expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Traci VanZandt

customer_reviews.title: Better wait for improvements
customer_reviews.text: It was very fun to use! However I only took it out twice before the sky controller 2 stopped working! Parrot support was friendly but ultimately had no idea what happened or how to fix it so I returned it and planned on purchasing another one... Until I read the other bad experiences of Disco owners. I've decided for the same price to purchase the DJI Mavic which will come with 3 batteries!
customer_reviews.author: survivalist

customer_reviews.title: Quickest way to loose $1300.00
customer_reviews.text: Not ready for prime time. It is the quickest way to loose $1300.00 No support, they will make every effort to avoid fixing damage there app and controller caused.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Flies great though. Loved the autopilot feature
customer_reviews.text: Camera is always blurry. Replaced unit, problem remained. Returned. Flies great though. Loved the autopilot feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was so excited, now terribly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great effort from Parrot, but it's not completely ready for prime time. It flew away and would not let me take control :(
customer_reviews.author: Don3

customer_reviews.title: With Disco, sky indeed is the limit.
customer_reviews.text: Have flown a number of quadcopter drones, but they don't compare with the excitement of flying the disco. It is just an amazing piece of machine
customer_reviews.author: Malik K.

customer_reviews.title: Find a place to land before you take off
customer_reviews.text: It is really really cool but there's one point that I have to say, DON'T FLY NEAR THE TREE, DON'T TRY TO LAND WITHOUT A LARGE AREA OF GRASSLAND!!!! Or you will see the photos attached near your house. My drone was stuck in a 20-meter-high tree. There was no way to rescue... I prayed for the storm and it did come and save my drone... only slight damage at last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am already receive the order. Parrot disco is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Nothing so far got for Christmas wing has major gap contacted parrot support been just about a month and have heard nothing besides when i call they say case is escalated got case number but heard nothing about repair or replace beside they are behind do to Christmas poor support
customer_reviews.author: izio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly but soon becomes boring!
customer_reviews.text: Just flew mine for the first time. It is easy to fly and has some great features but you will get bored very quick. I can not believe there is not an advanced mode that lets you fly it like any other RC airplane. It would be fantastic if you could do acro and then if you got into trouble toggle it back to "save me" mode. Limited to shallow turns and climbs is great for the first few flights but I don't see flying this thing for long. I guess that's why they are being dumped for $300 at other sites like BuyDig.
customer_reviews.author: Sig Freund

customer_reviews.title: Battery suck
customer_reviews.text: Although i love the drone itself customer service from parrot is terrible. Be prepared to replace the drone battery every six months as they do not last much longer than that. I will be doing a battery mod to use a lipo battery from a hobby shop
customer_reviews.author: cullen

customer_reviews.title: Parrot is terrible...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase, Parrot support and software update are terrible. Lost my drone due to glitches in software update, Parrot said too bad, so sad. They could care less about customers.
customer_reviews.author: Broken Like Me

customer_reviews.title: PHONE GOT SO HOT IN THE GOGGLES IT SHUT DOWN!!!
customer_reviews.text: BE AWARE FPV goggles will cause your phone to over heat. My phone got so hot it shut down while flying quite a distance away. FPV is blurry and when I sent it back to Parrot they won't refund the money after they sent a return label!!!! Bad company bad product bad service!!! My battery on my Galaxy isn't as good as it was before I used this!!! Don't do it!!!
customer_reviews.author: saberfly

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings now. Parrot support actually did right by me and it feels off to bash them. What a turn around support wise.
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my original posting. I have been sent a replacement that I will be selling but the way this was handled shows good faith on the side of parrot. I am giving it three stars because man this thing is a blast to fly. But I had some other things happen that prevent me from giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Todd F

customer_reviews.title: Cost allot but very fun
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this and flown it half a dozen times over two days. Compared to a quadcopter its a mind blowing fun experience. The drone need a huge amount of space to land but one of the things I like about it is it's far more immune to bird strikes than the bebop.As the propeller is on the back instead of the top. As I understand it this isn't parrots first fixed wing as I think they make a delta wing drone for the agricultural industry. And I have always found parrots customer service responsive unlike other drone manufacturers I won't mention.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bunce

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: To be priced this high with no GPS means no sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Libsarecommies

customer_reviews.title: It's so sad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought the disco yet, but i was at the site ready to push the button. But, what I couldn't understand was that i never saw it land. All the reviews show that it crashes before the landing. So, just by chance, i check out these reviews. I did because I didn't like the price and wanted to see what others thought, especially with the low rating. WOW. My mind was made up after the reviews... seems like Parrot needs to fix the drone, then fix its rep. Just sayin', Dan
customer_reviews.author: HoboDan

customer_reviews.title: The reviews make you think twice.
customer_reviews.text: Ive never owned this plane before but after reading kevins review of how Parrot drones called him a liar and he ended up swallowing the $1300 cost of a drone..... i think i had to get on and rate 1 star. I would be furious if that were me.
customer_reviews.author: Hyundaiguy

product_meta.title: Parrot Disco FPV – Easy to fly fixed wing drone, up to 45 minutes of flight time, 50 mph top speed, FPV goggles
product_meta.description: Parrot Disco FPV – Easy to fly fixed wing drone, up to 45 minutes of flight time, 50 mph top speed, FPV goggles
feature_bullets: Fixed-wing drone that reaches speeds up to 50 mph
Ultra-precise piloting and extended flight range of up to 1.2 mile with Parrot Skycontroller 2
Immersive flight experience with Parrot Cockpitglasses (FPV goggles)
Shoot full HD 1080P videos and 14Mpx photos with the built-in wide-angle camera. Footage can be captured in RAW, JPEG and DNG format.
High capacity 2700mAh battery with up to 45 min battery life
Easy to fly with automatic take-off and landing, assisted piloting controls, anti-stall system, and Return Home functionality
Compatible Smartphone screen size for the Cockpitglasses: 4.7 - 5.2" / 12 - 13 cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars148 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
